channel.title: Dates & News
channel.copyright: The participating universities do not take any liability for the correctness and completeness of the information on their websites. The same applies to the contents of linked pages.

item.description: p { line-height: 1.6; margin: 18px 0; font-size: 18px; } FAQs I am currently studying in program A at University B and have taken courses in C, D and E. Am I eligible for the program? We kindly ask for your understanding that we cannot respond to such inquiries. The purpose of the application process is to answer questions like this. Please submit a full application such that we can consider your materials.

Program Structure 4 ME8: Master Thesis 30 ECTS 3 ME4: Time Series Analysis 10 ECTS ME6: Applied Econometrics 11 - 26 ECTS ME5: Economics 11 - 26 ECTS 2 ME2: Econometrics 9 ECTS ME6: Applied Econometrics ME7: Econometric Methods ME3: Case Studies 8 ECTS 1 ME1:
